Yes No Sunbeam Inn Home About Us Casino Contacts Home About Us Casino Contacts Welcome to Sunbeam Inn – Your Ultimate Sunny Getaway Experience the warmth of the sun and the comfort of luxury at Sunbeam Inn, where every moment is designed to make your stay unforgettable. Nestled in the heart of a picturesque coastal town, our hotel offers an unparalleled combination of breathtaking views, modern amenities, and exceptional service, ensuring that your vacation is nothing short of perfect. Find Out More Advantages of Staying at Sunbeam Inn Accommodations Experience the epitome of comfort in our elegantly designed rooms and suites, featuring modern amenities and stunning views. Exquisite Dining Savor culinary delights crafted by our expert chefs, offering a variety of dining options to suit every taste and occasion. Top-Notch Amenities Enjoy our extensive range of amenities, including a sparkling outdoor pool, rejuvenating spa, and fully equipped fitness center. Prime Location Discover the beauty of our coastal town, with easy access to pristine beaches, cultural attractions, and exciting outdoor activities. Discover Our Unique Features At Sunbeam Inn, we offer a variety of unique features that set us apart and ensure a memorable stay for all our guests. From luxurious accommodations to exceptional amenities, discover what makes our inn the perfect destination for your next getaway. Stunning Views: Enjoy breathtaking views of the ocean or lush gardens from the comfort of your room. Our inn is designed to provide you with a serene and picturesque environment. Gourmet Dining: Indulge in a culinary experience like no other. Our on-site restaurants offer a diverse menu of gourmet dishes crafted from the freshest local ingredients. Luxurious Accommodations: Relax in elegantly designed rooms and suites that combine modern comforts with timeless elegance. Each space is thoughtfully appointed to enhance your stay. Yes No Sunbeam Inn Home About Us Casino Contacts Home About Us Casino Contacts Privacy Policy Welcome to Sunbeam Inn. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice or our practices with regard to your personal information, please contact us. We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on our website, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, or otherwise when you contact us. The personal information we collect may include your name, email address, postal address, phone number, and other similar contact data. We also collect passwords, password hints, and similar security information used for authentication and account access. We use the information we collect or receive to send administrative information to you, to protect our services, to enforce our terms, conditions, and policies, and to comply with legal and regulatory requirements. We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations. We may process or share your data based on your consent, legitimate business interests, or for compliance with legal obligations. We will only keep your personal information for as long as it is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy notice, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. You have certain rights under applicable data protection laws. These may include the right to request access and obtain a copy of your personal information, to request rectification or erasure, to restrict the processing of your personal information, and if applicable, to data portability. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us. We will consider and act upon any request in accordance with applicable data protection laws. If you have questions or comments about this notice, you may contact us at sunbeaminn@gmail.com. Sunbeam Inn Home About Us Contact Casino Privacy Policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer

Yes No Sunbeam Inn Home About Us Casino Contacts Home About Us Casino Contacts About Us Welcome to Sunbeam Inn, a sanctuary where luxury meets tranquility. Our inn is more than just a place to stay; it's an experience designed to delight your senses and rejuvenate your spirit. Nestled along the stunning coastline, Sunbeam Inn offers a perfect blend of modern comfort and natural beauty, making it an ideal destination for both relaxation and adventure. Our journey began over two decades ago, when Jane and John stumbled upon this picturesque location during one of their travels. They immediately fell in love with the serene beaches, lush landscapes, and the welcoming local community. Driven by a passion for hospitality and a commitment to excellence, they transformed a charming old house into what is now Sunbeam Inn. With continuous improvements and expansions, we have maintained the charm and warmth of our beginnings while offering modern amenities and luxurious accommodations. Our Mission At Sunbeam Inn, our mission is to provide our guests with an unparalleled experience of comfort, relaxation, and personalized service. We believe that every guest deserves a unique and memorable stay, and we strive to exceed expectations in every aspect of our hospitality. From the moment you arrive, our dedicated team is here to ensure that your stay is nothing short of extraordinary. We are committed to creating a welcoming environment where guests can unwind and feel at home. Whether you are here for a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a solo retreat, we offer a range of services and amenities tailored to meet your needs. Our goal is to make every visit to Sunbeam Inn a cherished memory that you will treasure for years to come. We strive to exceed our guests' expectations in every aspect of their stay. From the comfort and cleanliness of our rooms to the friendliness and professionalism of our staff, we are dedicated to maintaining the highest standards of excellence. Discover Our Values Sustainability We are dedicated to protecting the natural beauty of our surroundings through sustainable practices. From energy-efficient systems to eco-friendly amenities, we make every effort to minimize our environmental impact. Community We are proud to be a part of the local community and are committed to supporting local businesses and initiatives. We believe in giving back to the community that has given us so much. Excellence We strive for excellence in every aspect of our operations, from the quality of our accommodations to the level of our service. Our commitment to excellence ensures that our guests receive the best possible experience. Hospitality We believe in treating our guests like family, offering a warm and welcoming atmosphere that makes everyone feel at home. Our friendly and attentive staff is always ready to assist with any request, big or small. Guest Reviews "Our stay at Sunbeam Inn was absolutely wonderful. The staff was incredibly attentive, the rooms were luxurious, and the views were breathtaking. We can't wait to come back!" John "Sunbeam Inn exceeded all of our expectations. The food was delicious, the spa treatments were relaxing, and the overall atmosphere was so peaceful. Highly recommend!" Sarah Sunbeam Inn Home About Us Contact Casino Privacy Policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer

Yes No Sunbeam Inn Home About Us Casino Contacts Home About Us Casino Contacts Welcome to our casino Welcome to our casino, a premier destination for entertainment and gaming. Established in 1995, our casino has grown to become one of the most respected and renowned gaming establishments in the region. We started with a modest facility, offering a handful of slot machines and table games. Over the years, through our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, we have expanded significantly, incorporating the latest in gaming technology and offering a wide variety of games and services. Find Out More About Us Our casino was founded in 1995 with a vision to create a world-class gaming and entertainment destination. Starting with just a few slot machines and table games, we have continually expanded our offerings and facilities to meet the growing demands of our patrons. Over the years, we have hosted numerous high-profile events, tournaments, and performances, cementing our reputation as a leader in the industry. Our journey has been marked by continuous innovation and a focus on providing a superior guest experience. From the latest gaming technology to luxurious accommodations and dining, we have set new standards in the casino world. Our history is rich with milestones, including the launch of our state-of-the-art sportsbook and the opening of our renowned poker room. Games and Entertainment Slot Machines With hundreds of slot machines ranging from penny slots to high-stakes games, you are sure to find a machine that suits your style. Table Games Enjoy traditional favorites such as Blackjack, Roulette, Poker, and Baccarat. Our professional dealers ensure a fair and exciting gaming experience. Roulette Roulette is one of the most iconic and exciting games in the casino world, known for its elegance, simplicity, and the thrill of the spinning wheel. Live Poker Room Test your skills in our dedicated poker room, where you can participate in daily tournaments and cash games.
